title: Manage Live News Broadcast Feed
description: During a live news broadcast, the primary video feed from a remote journalist fails. The agent must switch to a backup feed.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the 'Loss of Signal' alarm on the primary remote feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent immediately identifies the failed feed.

tasks.description: Instantly switch the live program output to the available backup satellite feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the feed switch with minimal on-air disruption.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for the engineering team to diagnose the failure of the primary feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-priority ticket for the engineering team.
